summary.p: BMX is a framework for Apache to provide internal runtime statistics and configuration information to interested remote agents. It can be used to report on the internal workings and status of Apache at runtime, such as performance metrics and current capacity.
The mod_bmx module is the core BMX module and must be loaded in order to support any BMX plugins. It provides the base functionality for satisfying BMX queries.
BMX includes a several plugin modules to report specific server information, including mod_bmx_status and mod_bmx_vhost, as well as an API for creating new BMX plugin extensions.

section.title: Configuring mod_bmx
section.p: The mod_bmx base module must be loaded to serve bmx response pages, and all desired mod_bmx_{provider} modules must also be loaded, such as mod_bmx_status and/or mod_bmx_vhost. The example configuration below will serve the bmx result page from http://localhost/bmx including server status and virtual host summaries, only in response to a local request:
section.highlight:
LoadModule bmx_module modules/mod_bmx.so LoadModule bmx_status_module modules/mod_bmx_status.so LoadModule bmx_vhost_module modules/mod_bmx_vhost.so
ExtendedStatus On
<Location /bmx> SetHandler bmx-handler Require ip 127.0.0.1 ::1 </Location>

section.title: Querying mod_bmx
section.p: mod_bmx accepts query arguments in order to return a more limited scope of information. The default query pattern, if none is specified, is ?query=*:*.
http://localhost/bmx?query=mod_bmx_status:* will return only the status-related elements from mod_bmx_status.
http://localhost/bmx?query=mod_bmx_vhost:Type=since-restart will return only vhost-specific tallies from mod_bmx_vhost since the most recent server restart.
http://localhost/bmx?query=mod_bmx_vhost:Port=443 will return only vhost-specific tallies from mod_bmx_vhost for the https virtual hosts.
Consult the specific bmx plugin docs and source code for other query variables specific to the bmx bean provider, and the README-BMX file for more of the underlying API and query mechanics.
